bio: I am a motivated and detail-oriented engineer with a background in Electronics and Communication Engineering, currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Engineering at Paderborn University, Germany. I am driven by a strong passion for technology, innovation, and building solutions that address real-world challenges.

I previously served as a Migration Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), where I applied my technical and analytical skills to deliver efficient, scalable cloud migration solutions. In addition, I completed a research internship at the Space Applications Centre (ISRO), contributing to the development of advanced satellite communication systems.

My current academic focus lies in advanced computing, cloud technologies, and intelligent systems. I am actively pursuing the Google Professional Cloud Architect Certification and am particularly interested in bridging embedded systems with cloud computing to create impactful, real-world innovations.
keyAchievements: Led cloud-to-cloud data migration pipelines at TCS
Developed Doppler-aware PLL system during ISRO internship
Built IoT-based Smart Stove Safety System
Google Cloud Associate Cloud Engineer certified

responsibilities: Spearheaded cloud-to-cloud data migrations and optimized migration pipelines for performance and scalability
Ensured data integrity through schema analysis, mapping, validation, and normalization
Developed testing and troubleshooting strategies to minimize downtime and data loss
Collaborated with cross-functional teams while maintaining compliance with data security standards
Designed signal processing system for down conversion and data recovery using DSP techniques
Developed phase-locked loop (PLL) to track Doppler shift for positioning
Implemented carrier and symbol tracking algorithms
Improved positioning accuracy using Doppler-based estimation
Developed sensor-based IoT product using Arduino Uno
Enabled real-time environmental sensing and automation
Improved system responsiveness using sensor-driven logic

projects.title: Smart Stove Safety System (IoT-Based)
projects.description: Developed a sensor-based stove safety system to detect gas leaks and automatically shut off the stove while triggering alerts. Improved household safety using real-time IoT automation.
